Articles.Content:
Danos GTR

My first car-like rover/craft, hope you guys like it, it went through a lot of testing and was created accidentally.

Its doesn't work properly on Mun,Duna or any other planet beside Kerbin and Laythe.

 

 

 

Used Mods:

VenStockRevamp

PlanetaryBaseInc

TweakScale

DOWNLOAD

 

 

 

Edited November 30, 2015 by Fl0oo

I dunno, I think it's nice, really cute

Perfect for a race challenge around the KSC...
As soon as the new wheel module has arrived, yes. Playing with downforce/camber/sway bars/bump/rebound to get the ideal drift setup ... That would be fantastic.

Waste of time ...

Ive had couple hundred part ships that I spent many hours working on that barely got a glance, my SSTO's get triple the number of downloads my aircraft get and they get twice what the rockets get. It's just the Lull before 1.1, theres mainly just the long termers and the odd newbie cruising the forums at the moment.

Waste of time ...

Not at all man. I think the issue is you have a 20ish part count craft that requires 3 mods to work.

People don't like having to download a bunch o stuff to try a craft. Looking at yours I can see it could easily be made with stock parts.

Also, if you are releasing only one craft, maybe hold off releasing it and put together a pack consisting of a few different craft.

Keep it up man, it's never easy at first for most.

I think I produced the largest Space Station for a single launch and it barely got noticed, don't let the lack of replies discourage you, keep building and you will make more crafts that will have this one looked at in the future. I like the craft but I don't use any mods at this time as the Major explained.

I think I produced the largest Space Station for a single launch and it barely got noticed, don't let the lack of replies discourage you, keep building and you will make more crafts that will have this one looked at in the future. I like the craft but I don't use any mods at this time as the Major explained.

Thank you, I'll will keep building.

Not at all man. I think the issue is you have a 20ish part count craft that requires 3 mods to work.

People don't like having to download a bunch o stuff to try a craft. Looking at yours I can see it could easily be made with stock parts.

Also, if you are releasing only one craft, maybe hold off releasing it and put together a pack consisting of a few different craft.

Keep it up man, it's never easy at first for most.

You are right, but I'm in love with VenStockRevamp texture and models ... I will try some stock too.
